attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP!!!!
attributes.review: I downloaded this app hoping to see news coming straight from Trump. But right when I opened the app my phone started glitching, and on top of that it asked to use my camera. I pressed no because why would a Trump app need my camera access??? Anyways, later that very night I was using the toilet when i realized my camera was on! The only app that was still open was the Trump app! It is unbelievable that I denied access yet they still got into my camera! Other than that, this app glitches a ton and makes my battery go down so quick!! Hopefully this helped someone. DO NOT BUY THIS APP!!!!

attributes.title: worst experience of my life
attributes.review: if there was a button for no stars i would definitely press it. words cannot explain how bad this app is. it gave me a virus and now my phone glitches every second and i worked so dam hard to get this phone. also the app did this weird glitch where it showed other ppl my IP address and last night a drug dealer was at my door threatening to kill me if i didnâ€™t undownload the app. i canâ€™t believe donald trump would do this to me and put me in such a unsafe situation. i use to like him cuz i was a fan of hot cheetos but now i am in disbelief. do not download or there will be a drug dealer at ur house to kill you

attributes.title: WHERE IS YOUR MANAGER?
attributes.review: I want to see someone whoâ€™s in chargeâ€” corporate preferably. I open up my app to worship my glorious leader Kim Jong Un but find that Peppa Pig has been posting his nudes on this app. I immediately dial the Paw Patrol to report this atrocity. They arrest Peppa, but his bacon bits are still out and floating the inter web. I email Sharon about this issue and she referred me back to the Paw Patrol. The issue remains unsolved. My leader will be very unimpressed that I have not done my daily worship ritual in his name today. I call my great leader, Papi Kim Jong Un, to resolve this issue but all I can see is the explicit image of Peppa and his bean tanning in the Louisiana sun. This app is broken and I am behind schedule.

attributes.title: Spiders!!!! ğŸğŸğŸ›ğŸ¶ğŸ¦‰
attributes.review: As soon as I opened this app spiders and I mean SPIDERS! Came crawling out of the screen. I screamed and grabbed a hammer to smash the phone and spiders. And the hammer just and broke then I ran to my car and drove to Home Depot to buy the 20 head hammer. As I walked in millions of phones dropped from the ceiling. and spiders followed by aliens dinosaurs, cats dogs lizards and toons of other bugs came crawling out of the phones I passed out of fright and woke up in a school. I looked around and saw toons of bugs in the school chairs and a big bug as the teacher. I RAN out of there to my house. I looked in the mirror to only realize I was a bug to. Then my dog came and ate me ğŸ¥ºğŸ˜±ğŸ˜–ğŸ˜Ÿâ˜¹ï¸

attributes.title: Donâ€™t do it!
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to see why it was so horrible. Nothing happened at first I thought everyone was exaggerating, but a few hours later everything changed. I had set my phone down for a bit and when I returned I found that both my home and lock screen where changed to different images of Cheetos! Cheetos golfing and Cheetos stepping off of airplanes with toilet paper on its shoes. I even had some pictures added to my camera roll of Cheetos hiding in a bunker! Needless to say I was horrified, if you would like to spare yourself from this traumatizing experience please do not download this app!

attributes.title: inappropriate behavior from our president
attributes.review: i was so excited to use this app bc iâ€™m a HUGE trump supporter. we are a cult and we plan on making america white again, like how it should be. but when i went on to the app the FIRST thing i saw was trumps n00ds. now donâ€™t get me wrong i am in love with this man just like all the other trump supporters, bc like i said weâ€™re a cult and would do literally anything for him. so with that being said as much as i appreciated the thought of him sharing himself and opening up to us in this way, i just donâ€™t think he is spreading the right message to his people who are newly starting to support him.

attributes.title: cheeto slug man ğŸ˜–
attributes.review:
I was so excited to show my support for our PrEsIdEnT ğŸ§šâœ¨ğŸ’•ğŸ’…but instead of a glorious man i was faced with an image that has haunted my nightmares since i was 3. you see, growing
up was a difficult and scary time for me as i was constantly plagued by nightmares. the same man would always appear, telling me he was gonna spank me and lick cheeto dust off my buttcheeks. i never knew who this man was and i went to go see several psychologists and sleep therapists but nothing helped. today, i opened the app to see the man i had named "the cheeto slug man" and my nightmares have only gotten worse. this app is a 0/10 and will give you sleep cancer.
